TITLE: Services
HERO_DESCRIPTION: Since its establishment in 2009, El-Etqan Company provides integrated solutions in fingerprint devices, surveillance cameras, and advanced technical services, implemented by a team of expert engineers in Egypt
WHY_ETQAN_TITLE: Why El-Etqan Company is Your Ideal Partner
WHY_ETQAN_DESCRIPTION: Discover the top three reasons why you should choose El-Etqan and benefit from the services and solutions we offer...
FEATURES_BOX1_DESC: Certified technicians with no less than 15 years of experience in this field.
FEATURES_BOX2_DESC: Partnerships with prestigious international brands (e.g., Pironix, FingrTech, CNP).
FEATURES_BOX3_DESC: Designs customized to meet unique client requirements.
FEATURES_BOX4_DESC: From consulting to maintenance, we are with you every step of the way.
FEATURES_BOX5_DESC: We provide continuous support after project completion to ensure optimal system performance and client satisfaction.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: El-Etqan Company is part of Dar Group of Companies, a leading provider of electromechanical and low-current systems in the Egyptian market for many years. We offer innovative low-current systems and integrated technological solutions through global brands in this field
